sentences.en: Among the varieties available, my preference stays with the old and lovely pink-flowered variety, "Apple Blossom".
sentences.cn: 可供选择的品种当中，我还是偏好这种老式、可爱、带有粉色花朵的类型，“苹果花”。

sentences.en: Flowers blossom in a riot of colour.
Hopefully the tree will produce some blossom next year.
sentences.cn: 这棵树有望在明年开花.

sentences.en: It's lovely in the spring when the cherry blossom is out.
sentences.cn: 春天樱花开放,十分美丽.

sentences.en: The apple - blossom hasn't [ The apples haven't ] set well this year.
sentences.cn: 苹果花 [ 树 ] 今年尚未结好果实.

sentences.en: The apple blossom is beginning to drop.
sentences.cn: 苹果树上的花开始落了.

sentences.en: The apple trees are just beginning to blossom.
The blossom on the trees looks lovely in springtime.
The cherry blossom came out early in Washington this year.
sentences.cn: 今年华盛顿的樱花开得很早。

sentences.en: The cherry tree was covered in blossom.
The oriental cherry is in full blossom.
The pear blossom is beginning to drop.
There is no blossom this year on the plum trees.
When the fruit trees are in bud or blossom, frosts may damage the crops.
sentences.cn: 果树在发芽或开花的时候, 霜冻会使它减产.

sentences.en: Why do some people take longer than others to blossom?
sentences.cn: 为什么有的人比他人大器晚成？

words.tran_cn: [植]花；开花期；兴旺期；花开的状态

trans.tran_en: a flower or the flowers on a tree or bush

trans.tran_cn: 兴盛，变得成功，（树木）开花
trans.tran_en: if trees blossom, they produce flowers

trans.tran_cn: 开花； 发展， 长成
trans.tran_en: if trees blossom, they produce flowers
